title: X10: Adjusted employment, unemployment, and economic inactivity
creator: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/office-for-national-statistics
summary: Experimental labour market estimates using administrative data to produce adjusted UK employment, unemployment and economic inactivity measures, seasonally adjusted. Includes a breakdown by countries and regions of the UK.
description: Experimental labour market estimates using administrative data to produce adjusted UK employment, unemployment and economic inactivity measures, seasonally adjusted. Includes a breakdown by countries and regions of the UK.
